work.summary: Leverage agile frameworks to provide a robust synopsis for high level overviews. Iterative approaches to corporate strategy foster collaborative thinking to further the overall value proposition. Organically grow the holistic world view of disruptive innovation via workplace diversity and empowerment.
highlights: Dealt with Elastical Gomez on a daily basis.
Directing the operations of the Crisis Center Mobile.
Assisting with decisionmaking in Jyväskylä regions judicial system.

publications.name: Radio Julius
publications.summary: Capitalize on low hanging fruit to identify a ballpark value added activity to beta test.

interests.name: About myself
keywords: I have an outgoing personality and I'm interested in different cultures. That is why I enjoy traveling and getting to know new people. I am also very fond of different languages (and I speak fluently four languages). I also read a lot, either to study something or just for fun. And like the good Finnish citizen I am, I spend a lot of time at our summer cottage.

references.name: Hannele Koski
references.reference:
Hannele Koski is the director of health and eldercare and she was previously my superior. You can contact her on her phone during business hours.
+358 4451 02020
